Package com.bitsavior.entity

Class LightSource

java.lang.Object
com.bitsavior.entity.Entity
com.bitsavior.entity.LightSource
public class LightSource
extends Entity
represents a light source in the game works with textures and alphablending

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  LightSource.TYPE
    represents the huetype of the lightsource

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color
    hue of the lightsource
    private float intensityFactor
    alpha value of the color adjusts the intensity of the light
    private Entity parent
    holds a reference to the entity the light is attached to

    Fields inherited from class com.bitsavior.entity.Entity

    isAlive, velocity

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    LightSource​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture)
    Constructor sets a cold hue and attach the texture

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void attach​(Entity entity)
    attaches the lightsource to an entity attach an entity automatically sets the center of the lightsource to the center of the attached entity
    void draw​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, float Delta)
    draws the lightsource must be called inside the lightbuffer to work properly
    float getIntensityFactor()  
    void setColor​(LightSource.TYPE colorType)
    sets the hue of the lightsource

    sets the Intensity of the light via the alpha value
    void setRadius​(float radius)
    set the radius of the lightsource
    void update()
    updates the position accordingly to the attached parent entity need to be called in the entities update function to work properly

  • Field Details

    • parent

      private Entity parent
      holds a reference to the entity the light is attached to

    • color

      private final com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color color
      hue of the lightsource

      private float intensityFactor
      alpha value of the color adjusts the intensity of the light

  • Constructor Details

    • LightSource

      public LightSource​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture)
      Constructor sets a cold hue and attach the texture
      Parameters:
      texture - : lightsource texture that is used to create the lightningeffect

  • Method Details

    • attach

      public void attach​(Entity entity)
      attaches the lightsource to an entity attach an entity automatically sets the center of the lightsource to the center of the attached entity
      Parameters:
      entity - : entity that should hold this light

    • update

      public void update()
      updates the position accordingly to the attached parent entity need to be called in the entities update function to work properly

    • setColor

      public void setColor​(LightSource.TYPE colorType)
      sets the hue of the lightsource
      Parameters:
      colorType - : desired hue

    • setIntensity

      public void setIntensity​(float intensityFactor)
      sets the Intensity of the light via the alpha value
      Parameters:
      intensityFactor - : must be between 0 to 1, 0 = invisible, 1 = full intensity

    • getIntensityFactor

      public float getIntensityFactor()
      Returns:
      : intensity value of the light, 0 = invisible, 1 = full intensity

    • setRadius

      public void setRadius​(float radius)
      set the radius of the lightsource
      Parameters:
      radius - : radius of the lightsource

    • draw

      public void draw​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, float Delta)
      draws the lightsource must be called inside the lightbuffer to work properly
      Overrides:
      draw in class Entity
      Parameters:
      batch - : current SpriteBatch for drawing
      Delta - : elapsed time since last frame
